articles.title: View: Got change? Why digital cash needs to feel real - Economic Times
articles.description: Spreading cash among consumers and collecting notes from businesses is a labor-intensive activity that doesnt sit well with Japans shrinking workforce. In India, fewer notes will lead to pubic savings on $600 million in annual printing costs.

articles.title: Combining tax benefits with superior returns: Tax-savings funds that top the charts - Moneycontrol
articles.description: Equity-Linked Saving Schemes (ELSS) or tax-saving equity funds are the only pure equity instrument in the basket of instruments eligible for Section 80C tax deduction benefits
